testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first and last name..........................................passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email and password and confirm password......................passed And user press on register button...........................................passed Then user register to the system successfully...............................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to open their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid "AbdelrahmanMohamed@gmail.com" and "p@$$word"....passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_currencies | user could switch between different currencies
testcase.name: user could move between currencies
testcase.system-out: When user select random currency............................................passed And currency is changed in Home Page correctly..............................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | users will be able to search for products with different parameters
testcase.name: user could search using product name
testcase.system-out: Given user clicks on search field...........................................passed When user search with name of product.......................................passed Then user could find relative results.......................................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | users will be able to search for products with different parameters
testcase.name: user could search using sku
testcase.system-out: Given user clicks on search field...........................................passed When user search with sku of product "AP_MBP_13"............................passed Then user will find only one results and user will click on it..............passed Then verify sku "AP_MBP_13".................................................passed

testcase.classname: F05_hoverCategories | user could hover categories and select sub category
testcase.name: user could hover categories
testcase.system-out: Given user hover category and select subcategory and go to desktop..........passed Then check page title with selected.........................................passed
